Dead by Daylight- эта игра заставит вас испытать все чувства сразу, страх, ненависть, непонимание, смех. 20 улетевших ворон из 10.

Dead by Daylight has an incredible balance between two very different styles of play, and makes both very fun and satisfying. 
If you enjoy slasher movies, you're in for a treat because each match feels like a mini horror movie on both sides. As killer you need to be efficient and unpredictable. As survivor you need to be elusive and work as a team.
This game can be very competitive, but not really in an eSports kind of way.
Because there are so many killers, perks, items, addons, offerings, etc... sometimes these things in the right hands can determine the outcome of a match from the start.
This game is more like Mario Party when I say it's competitive, as you definitely are rewarded with skill, but absolutely anyone can take it away with a well placed ability or even just luck.
This is the best asymmetrical game on the market.
If you play this game, remember to play BOTH SIDES!!

9/10

(Only reason why it's not a 10 from me is because you will find "bully squads" when you play killer, and if you play in later hours of the night, the community gets pretty toxic and unfairly scrutinizes everything and anything the killer has done. Just remember, it's your game too! Mad cuz bad amirite?
You're going to see that a lot in this community, I mean just look at the other Steam reviews, you can tell that 50% of the negative reviews were written directly after a bad match, you can feel how angry the writer is just from reading!
Also there are bugs/exploits that make it through certain patches, however BHVR tends to clean these up fairly quickly. People don't give them enough credit, considering there are 197 perks that can drastically change the game, I think they've done an amazing job of keeping things more or less balanced.)

Dead by Daylight is a fantastic asymmetrical multiplayer horror experience that has exciting gameplay, with simple to complete objectives that have depth to them as you ascend in rank. I consistently have fun with this game, regardless of if I'm playing killer or survivor. There's really something here for most everyone, and while the dev team doesn't always listen to their playerbase, they consistently deliver chapters with diverse and fun killers to play as or against. I've been playing since 2019, and adore what and who they have added to this game.

運営がサバイバー専のため、サバイバー有利な調整をしまくりオナニーをしているだけのクソゲー。バイオで入ろうかなと悩んでいる新規、復帰勢は考え直そう。
どうしてもプレイしたいというクソゲーマニアで人生の大切な時間を溝に捨てたい変人にこれだけはやめろというポイントを一つ。
"煽るな"
あと勘違いしてる馬鹿サバイバー様がキャンプがートンネルがーなどとほざいているが立派な戦略なんで＾＾嫌ならDSつけるなどしろ。
煽りは相手のメンタルを云々のたまう脳のシワが足りていない枯葉剤をぶっかけられたアホもいるがそのことに関しては我らが最強DBD(馬鹿の作った公開オナニー)プレイヤーのしょこ様が配信内で言及しているので把握しとけ。
お前ら馬鹿なんだから
游戏是真的好玩 匹配机制是真的烂

Simplesmente não existe asymmetrical horror game melhor do que esse, os killers autorais são fantásticos e os killers licenciados matam aquela vontade de ver nossos personagens do terror favoritos. Jogo simplesmente SENSACIONAL!

Amazing game. Great to play with friends and a great way to enjoy an online spook. Game is perfectly balance in both mechanics and video/graphic requirements. Has many characters in both survivors and killers that you will never feel like you hit a brick wall. Every game offers something different and excitement.
